name: AlertDialog
description: Modal dialog for critical confirmations that requires explicit user action before proceeding

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as an alert dialog with role=alertdialog. Title and description are announced via aria-labelledby and aria-describedby. Focus is trapped within the dialog until dismissed.
knownLimitations: Cannot be dismissed via Escape key or outside click by design - requires explicit action/cancel button interaction

recommendedUsage: Use for destructive actions requiring confirmation (delete, discard changes) or critical decisions where accidental dismissal must be prevented.
antiPatterns: Do not use for non-critical information. For dismissable modals, use Dialog instead. Avoid for routine confirmations where Escape dismissal is expected.
